item.description:
This walk will go through some beautiful neighborhoods and parks. We will take scenic side streets that have sidewalks and are light. Some of the architecture on this walk is particularly interesting. Highlights of the walk include Chandler Pond, St. Johns Seminary, The Cenacles, Oak Square, Nonantum Hill and Wabin Hill.

We are meeting in front of White Mountain Creamery. It is located near the Boston College T Station. There is also plenty of free parking on the westbound side of Commonwealth Avenue.
item.name: The Hidden Gems of Brighton and Newton
